Title: Daimonion
Writer: Fabian Barth, Fabian Barth, Marcel Carasco, Marcel Carasco
Actors: Marcel A. Heizmann, Alex Anasuya, Clara Plume, Tankred Walz
Plot: When an investigative journalist returns home from the Congo to write an explosive book on uranium exports to Iraq, people around him begin to act suspiciously and alarming information about the disappearance of his girlfriend is revealed.
